|Contributors=Jennifer Cautela

[[File:Ecg typique.jpg|centré|vignette|900x900px|Sus décalage de ST, diffuse, non-systematisé, concave vers le haut, sans miroir ni onde Q ET sous décalage PQ]]

question.question: What is a characteristic of the electrocardiogram (ECG) in acute pericarditis?
question.option_b: Diffuse ST elevation, non-systematic, concave upwards, without mirror or Q wave, and normal PQ interval
